structure.unit: AGRICULTURAL SEEDS, FEEDING STUFFS, AND FERTILIZERS

law.history: Amended 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 68, sec. 7, effective July 15, 1996; and ch. 318, sec. 168, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1972 Ky. Acts ch. 24, sec. 8.

metadata.lrc-note: (7/15/96). This section was amended by 1996 Ky. Acts chs. 68 and 318 which do not appear to be in conflict and have been codified together.
